Game.Name: From TV Animation Slam Dunk - Kyougou Makkou Taiketsu! (Japan)
Game.plot: Slam Dunk is a Sports game, developed by Sims and published by Bandai,which was released in Japan in 1995.Cheat: Enhanced SakuragiNote: Enhanced Sakuragi can only be used and played in story mode.
Game.Notes: From TV Animation Slam Dunk: Kyougou Makkou Taiketsu! (テレビアニメ・スラムダンク 強豪真っ向対決！) is a 1995 basketball game by Bandai and SIMS for the Sega Mega Drive based on the Slam Dunk anime series.
